text: Lennart Axel Edvard Carleson (born 18 March 1928) is a Swedish mathematician. He is known as a leader in the field of harmonic analysis and for his proof of Lusin's conjecture. He was awarded the Wolf Prize in Mathematics in 1992, the Lomonosov Gold Medal in 2002, the Sylvester Medal in 2003, and the Abel Prize in 2006. He is a member of the Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters. In 1993 he became a member of the Academia Europaea. In 2012 he became a fellow of the American Mathematical Society.List of Fellows of the American Mathematical Society, retrieved 2012-11-10. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1928 births Category:Wolf Prize winners Category:Abel Prize winners Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:Mathematicians Category:Scientists from Stockholm
title: Lennart Carleson
